name: Shot In The Dark v1.0.1
description:
_____________________________________________________

v1.0.1 Version Intro

Shot in The Dark is the most advanced dual stick shooter game in the dark! There are mines, flares and 6 unique, upgradable weapons!  

Your tank has armor on all different sides and various repair kits and ammo spawn that you can replenish your supplies!

I recommend playing this game with a controller for precise aiming and moving

There is a Campaign, Duel, and Sandbox mode!

Please give feedback and suggestions! Made with:
Godot 3.2.2
